title: The "rEVOLution"
body_text:
Mike "Bizzle"
,
Jimmy B
, and the elderly man you see ... ? Sure, why not! Brothers battle it out for all the bragging rights in this rare
Family Feud
siblings encounter!
And it did not disappoint either! The influence from 2008 Presidential Candidate Ron Paul (R) must have factored in somehow. Jim's ever-so strong support team did whatever it took to outwit and outlast the opposition. Paul would have been so proud .. had he just shown up of course.
Nevertheless, the brothers themselves tangled in a few heated physical altercations - "The Primaries" if you will - each scoring decisive eliminations on the other.
But it was the overall score, the "rEVOLution!", that counted the most.
Flash Results by Game
:
James C. Butler defeated Michael Butler B.S., 6 - 1.
Jim: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7
Mike: 5
Ouch. Not what one would have expected, especially when looking at Jim's captains experience, or lack thereof really. But it's a huge victory for the 26 year-old, moving to 2-0-0.
Moments & Stars
: Mike Edwards parading around the court holding the over-sized, nearly-shredded Ron Paul sign in Game 1; the Smalls/Vetrano mid-court collision; Justin Wolf and Kevin Adams nailed two and three rimshots, respectively; the impressive showing from Michelle Mullins
Butler Beat Box 2
Special thanks to Captain Michael Butler for the creation of a fantastically emergetic soundtrack.
RECORDS
> Attendance: 24
> Notable Returns: Rob Avakian (last competed at DB 114); Joey Smalls (last competed at DB 116); Lauren Stopa (last competed at DB 116)
> New Players: 0
- DODGEBALL 121 kicked-off Season 13.
- DODGEBALL 121 was held on the back courts of Wall High School for the 33rd consecutive event. The neon pink and orange
Letsche Rims 2008
were also used.
- The match between brothers Jim and Mike Butler was just the ninth
Family Feud
encounter; but the first between the Butlers. The end result saw the elder Jim soundly defeat his rival sibling 6 to 1. Jim extends his win streak to two, now 2-0-0. Michael unfortunately falls to 2-2-0.
The Brothers, The Sisters, The Mayhem
.. DODGEBALL DAY 1 (9.3.05): V. Winston defeated L. Winston
.. DODGEBALL X (10.28.05): S. Adams defeated K. Adams
.. DODGEBALL XXVIII (2.25.06): C. Adams defeated S. Adams
..
DODGEBALL 50
(8.4.06): K. Adams/S. Adams defeated T. Adams/C. Adams
..
DODGEBALL 54
(9.3.06): V. Winston defeated L. Winston
.. DODGEBALL SIXTY-IX (12.23.06): L. Winston defeated V. Winston
.. DODGEBALL 87 (5.12.07) E. Nogueira defeated K. Nogueira
..
DODGEBALL 102
(9.1.07): L. Winston/DiBuccio defeated V. Winston/Stopa
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Season 13 Continues!
DODGEBALL 122: January 19, 2008 (Ray Marzarella vs. Mike Edwards)
DODGEBALL 123: January 26, 2008 (Kevin Fitzpatrick vs. Lenny Herrera)
DODGEBALL 124: February 2, 2008 ("Secret Selection")
DODGEBALL 125: February 9, 2008
DODGEBALL 126: February 16, 2008
DODGEBALL 127: February 23, 2008 (WALL vs. ALL 5)
DODGEBALL 128: March 1, 2008
DODGEBALL 129: March 8, 2008
DODGEBALL 130: March 15, 2008
body_html:
Mike "Bizzle", Jimmy B, and the elderly man you see ... ? Sure, why not! Brothers battle it out for all the bragging rights in this rare Family Feud siblings encounter!

And it did not disappoint either! The influence from 2008 Presidential Candidate Ron Paul (R) must have factored in somehow. Jim's ever-so strong support team did whatever it took to outwit and outlast the opposition. Paul would have been so proud .. had he just shown up of course.

Nevertheless, the brothers themselves tangled in a few heated physical altercations - "The Primaries" if you will - each scoring decisive eliminations on the other.

But it was the overall score, the "rEVOLution!", that counted the most.

Flash Results by Game: James C. Butler defeated Michael Butler B.S., 6 - 1.
Jim: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7
Mike: 5

Ouch. Not what one would have expected, especially when looking at Jim's captains experience, or lack thereof really. But it's a huge victory for the 26 year-old, moving to 2-0-0.

Moments & Stars: Mike Edwards parading around the court holding the over-sized, nearly-shredded Ron Paul sign in Game 1; the Smalls/Vetrano mid-court collision; Justin Wolf and Kevin Adams nailed two and three rimshots, respectively; the impressive showing from Michelle Mullins

Butler Beat Box 2
Special thanks to Captain Michael Butler for the creation of a fantastically emergetic soundtrack.

RECORDS
> Attendance: 24
> Notable Returns: Rob Avakian (last competed at DB 114); Joey Smalls (last competed at DB 116); Lauren Stopa (last competed at DB 116)
> New Players: 0

- DODGEBALL 121 kicked-off Season 13.
- DODGEBALL 121 was held on the back courts of Wall High School for the 33rd consecutive event. The neon pink and orange Letsche Rims 2008 were also used.
- The match between brothers Jim and Mike Butler was just the ninth Family Feud encounter; but the first between the Butlers. The end result saw the elder Jim soundly defeat his rival sibling 6 to 1. Jim extends his win streak to two, now 2-0-0. Michael unfortunately falls to 2-2-0.

.. DODGEBALL 102 (9.1.07): L. Winston/DiBuccio defeated V. Winston/Stopa
